resources.string: BucketList
Settings
Info_Activity
Films are very important, and so are festivals. Be sure to check both out simultaneously!
Fruit on a mountain. What could possibly go wrong? Probably nothing. Have fun!
Be careful near the scaffolding...
Your grandmother uses Facebook. What are you gonna be like your grandma or something? I\'m sure she\'s nice but sheesh, give it a rest.
Don\'t jump unless there\'s water below, and even then, probably don\'t jump.
This one is spooky. Don\'t attempt if you\'re not ready for spooks.
You don\'t have to read the whole book, but don\'t be a jerk and only read like a paragraph because that doesn\'t count and I\'m watching you.
You can support instead of running because running is hard and supporting is less hard.
Wait... There are ACTUALLY horses???
I hear it\'s free!
And no, it doesn\'t count if you go to sleep at 7 AM. That\'s cheating. Honor code.
By \"Something Greasy,\" we mean \"Gus Burger.\"
Should be pretty easy if you\'re already a First Year.
Taste responsibly.
There\'s no \'I\' in team, but there\'s one in IM Sport. So ya know... Eat your vegetables or whatever.
Don\'t just see it. EXPERIENCE IT.
Be sure to bring that funny cat toy thing that goes on your cap.
A slice of pizza that is. Grab a slice of PIZZA at Christians\' PIZZA.
Or ice fall-on-your-butt-hundreds-of-times if you\'re not the best skater. Still counts.
Either a reunion with people who lived in your dorm or a reunion in a random dorm OR BOTH!
